>I also need to know how to write test cases in Java using Junit

Please read the extremely good online documentation at http://www.junit.org.
That is how we all learned. There is no magic in JUnit; it is software like
any other kind of software. Learn by some combination of reading and
experimenting.

When you have specific questions, let us know.

JBR.
